name: MarketSim
description: A stock market simulator written in Typescript, React, Express, MongoDB, and Redis. Capstone project for Concordia University Diploma in Full Stack Web Development

name: MarketSim V2
description: Fork of MarketSim, rewritten with a PostgreSQL database & the NestJS backend framework

name: Go-fullstack
description: A project template with sensible defaults for creating REST api's or full stack projects in Go. Includes air for hot reloads, docker-compose support for PostgreSQL, Go-Chi for HTTP routing, and HTMX for interactive frontends, and a Makefile to bring it all together

name: Price comparison engine
description: A web scraping project for comparing grocery prices between multiple stores. Created with Go, SQLite and React

name: Wearables
description: A full stack e-commerce site created with React, Express, and MongoDB. Completed in a group with 4 other contributors

name: Asteroid Blaster
description: A cross between tetris and asteroids, written in JavaScript
